attributes.contentHtml:
Jerome You can refer to this link ANNOUNCEMENT And the proof above. The license was never nulled and isn't running anymore. I made an account just to look at it. They have stated (On all platoforms) That they where shutting that hosting company down. It's not unusual for a company to leave their services running till either they are purchased by a different company or asked by a provider to take it down. A DMCA Takedown on this is overkill.

On other note it just seems like you are here to start drama about something that was already disproven. No-where in the cancellation process does it state that you would have to take your work down.

I could change my mind buy this company from it's respectful owners and keep the same domain / name running on a renewd license. This happens quite alot and I've done it before.

If you wish to discuss further on a civilised matter then you can find me here!
Discord Profile Direct

  • Regards,
    Nicole H.
    Serena K.
